title: ACAC Basketball Game (Another Chance vs. Smart Place) DD Community
text:
10:00 a.m. Friday, Oct. 16, 2015 Categories 
Events, Sports ANOTHER CHANCE ABILITY CLASSIC Everyone is welcome to this FREE event. DONATIONS ARE GREATLY APPRECIATED!!! Another Chance vs. Smart Place Music by DJ Tabone! Come and cheer for these individuals showing no excuse for being GREAT BALLERS! Banners, Signs and Support items are encouraged and you sit and enjoy a wonder tournament of hoops between these two sports teams. Another Chance Customize Services Inc is a DBHDD Day Program for individuals with Physical and Developmental Disabilities. Another Chance, 5301 Snapfinger Park Drive, Decatur, GA 30035 INTERESTED IN PLAYING? Contact: Harold 678.518.1823 or hkinganotherchanceinc@gmail.com (referral: Eventbrite) Related
